[Espanso](https://espanso.org) package to easy say Thanks in different languages.

## Triggers

| Keyword             | Replaced                |
| ------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `:arabicthx`        | `Ø´ÙƒØ±Ø§`                  |
| `:arabicthanks`     | `Ø´ÙƒØ±Ø§`                  |
| ------------------- | ----------------------- |
| `:armenianthx`      | `Õ‡Õ¶Õ¸Ö€Õ°Õ¡Õ¯Õ¡Õ¬Õ¸Ö‚Õ©ÕµÕ¸Ö‚Õ¶`      |
